answers.answer: Has your doctor ruled out restless leg syndrome? Do you smoke? Could also be poor circulation.
Have they done MRI of your brain?

question: loss of sensation in feet,electric like shocks in toes, crawling burning sensations, feel like I have socks on when I don't.  Difficulty walking after resting and through night after sleeping.gets better as I walk then after the day of walking around is worse. CTScan normal for age, mild OA Small bulging disc not pressingon nerve. Clear of diabetes and anti neuclear antibodies.  Urgency with bowel movements, need to wee severa; time thru night. Feel good somedays then relapse.  What can it be. 55 yo female
title: Numb Feet Pain after rest
